channel.title: The HoClaus
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The HoClaus" - Incomplete information

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded:
Not particularly.

Either you were very unlucky or I was very lucky. I got six ornaments on the first day of Ninja-Mas.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: exactly how rare is the hoclaus mission? Because I've done a day's worth of ninjutsu D-ranks and it hasn't shown up once

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: That's because it is December. Anyone can get it now until January. But, you do have to be Season 2+ to get the Star.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: i Could get it without themes but i am S3

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: you can find it in Nin missions but only in December or via Filler missions

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: Is the mission The Hoclaus a rare mission or not. It is put under rare missions, but the description doesn't mention it.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: and your hokage buys you a tree

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: If you're Season3+

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: wait so i can get hoclaus? o_O

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded:
http://bvs.wikidot.com/items:ninja-mas-star

Wiki says +10% ryo.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: what does the ninja-mas star do?

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: Pester your kage for Upgrade Permissions and buy it. It's cheap, and handy to defray the cost of the Triple Holiday Themes, especially on the 25th of the month.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded:
the star is available as long as the themes are active.

and thanks, it seems i just didnt have a tree.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: My bad luck for the loss :)

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: well I got the star about 2 days ago….so it should be available

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded:
http://bvswiki.com/mission:it-s-that-time-of-year <— HoClaus special mission info.

About the Ninja-mas star: Is the mission available now? I've seen the Ornament mission about 8 times, but not the star mission once yet.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded:
kelumhi, I've unlocked it:

It's That Time of Year
Who's that Ninja Teleporting down the Ninja-Mas Tree?

(Requirements: Ninja-Mas Tree, Ninja-Mas Ornament)

I'll post up the full write up when I can complete it (if I get a full moon in today's dark hour, should be tonight).

Edit: Where'd you get the Ninja-mas star?

Edit #2: Nevermind, I should check my own site :P

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded:
idea: it might have somehting to do with me still being a sp. jonin

Edit, or something to do with it not being close to chrismas… ill put it off til the 23 then continue.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: i can at least confirm that which missions give which drops on the wiki are correct.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded:
This is what I did to get the HoClaus last December. You need 3 Ninjamas Ornaments. They are dropped by the two D-Rank missions that appear during December. I don't remember what they are called, but I think they both mention The HoClaus in the description or title. EDUT them, the drop rate was quite low before McMasters lowered all the drop rates. If you have a Ninjamas Ornament, the Special Mission to get The HoClaus should appear, but you need 3 to get him.

I was season 1 last December, so I have no idea how to get The Ninjamas Star.

item.title: Re: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded: To be honest, I have no idea how to obtain him, and I keep hearing conflicting reports.

item.title: The HoClaus
item.content:encoded:
today will be my third day with -150 stamina, and im still a little lost on how to obtain the hoclaus. would someone be so kind as to post how you get him or update the wiki (im willing if i find out how) on how to get him?

if we are missing a specail mission on how to get him, i can post the results of that as well if someone tells me on how to unlock it. currently i have the 3 themes activated, Ninja-Mas Ornament: 3, and i own a Ninja-Mas Star.
